meanings.definition: Resembling or relating to a bulla or blister.
meanings.sent1: The bullous rash on his arm looked red and swollen.
meanings.sent2: Her sunburn was so bad that it became bullous and painful.
meanings.sent3: The bullous bubbles on the bubble wrap made it fun to pop.
meanings.sent4: The bullous clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton balls.
meanings.sent5: The bullous blisters on his feet made it hard for him to walk.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the formation of bullae or blisters.
meanings.sent1: The bullous skin condition caused discomfort and itching.
meanings.sent2: After the burn, his skin became bullous and sensitive.
meanings.sent3: The bullous bubbles in the bath made it look like a science experiment.
meanings.sent4: The bullous growth on the plant spread rapidly like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The bullous blisters on her hands were a painful reminder of the accident.
